item.description:
This is the second of five 90 minute endurance races.  Postponed from May 21st to June 4th due to rain.

A few changes from the past years; They have increased the number of rounds from 4 to 5 and they have also increased the entry fee from $300 to $320.  Perhaps due to the added round, the top 3 from each round qualifies now for the outdoor finals, instead of the top 4 in the past years.

6:30 PM Driver Arrival, Check-In & Weigh-In
7:00 PM Drivers Meeting and Full Safety Briefing
7:30 PM Qualifying Session
8:15 PM Official Race Start
9:45 PM Official End of Race

The format may change at F1 Boston's discretion.

A minimum of 5 pit stops have to be completed during the course of the 90 minutes. Pit stop strategies have to be devised by each team.

The top 3 teams from each round will qualify to race in the 3 hour final on Saturday, September 15th at the F1 Outdoor track for a discounted price of $250 per team.

 

The cost per team for the 90 minute endurance is $320. You can go with a two ($160/driver) or three ($107/driver) driver team.

Please indicate your interest by RSVP'ing and letting me know if you prefer to be in a two or three driver team.

Once the teams have been made up, you can send me a check when I send in the application to F1 Boston.

As a disclaimer - I will try as much as possible to accommodate all who respond, but please note that due to team configurations as well as availability of grid positions, I cannot guarantee a spot for everybody.

 

Feel free to email me with any questions or concerns.
item.name: 90 Minute Endurance Race II
